ThingDef.label: Blight killer shell
ThingDef.description: A pressurized shell filled with blight killer liquid. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.

RecipeDef.label: Make Blight killer shells in bulk

ThingDef.label: Filth detergant shell
ThingDef.description: A pressurized shell filled with active detergant. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.

RecipeDef.label: Make filth detergant shells in bulk

ThingDef.label: Insect killer shell
ThingDef.description: A pressurized shell filled with insect killer foam. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.

RecipeDef.label: Make insect killer shells in bulk

ThingDef.label: IED Insect Killer trap
ThingDef.description: A pair of insect killer shells connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
